813080.name: Circadian
813080.description:
The World of Circadian

Circadian is an engaging retro-style role playing video game. Strange things start to happen in a small suburban town when the circadian sleep cycles of all creatures goes haywire. A group of misfits must work together to solve the mysteries of their community before the entire thing unravels. Unlock the secrets of the Unrest Rhythm, saving those you love, and possibly the entire world.

Welcome to Mount Olive!

Welcome to the small suburban village of Mount Olive! Here you'll find wildlife, trees, mountains and mysteries! Although known for its quiet atmosphere, this hamlet gets more peculiar every day. When a shady corporation suddenly moves into town, a young man finds himself on the short end of their laundry list. Take control of a group of young adults as they strive to protect themselves and their beloved suburb.

What to expect

  • Turn Based Combat
  • Quirky Characters
  • Unforgettable Enemies
  • Computer Hacking
  • Arcade Mini Games
  • Hamburgers
